titleStmt.title: Harvvards phlebotomy: or, A treatise of letting of bloud fitly seruing, as well for an aduertisement and remembrance to well minded chirurgians, as also to giue a caueat generally to all men to beware of the manifold dangers, which may ensue vpon rash and vnaduised letting of bloud. Comprehended in two bookes: written by Simon Harvvard.
titleStmt.author: Harward, Simon, fl. 1572-1614.

titleStmt.title: Harvvards phlebotomy: or, A treatise of letting of bloud fitly seruing, as well for an aduertisement and remembrance to well minded chirurgians, as also to giue a caueat generally to all men to beware of the manifold dangers, which may ensue vpon rash and vnaduised letting of bloud. Comprehended in two bookes: written by Simon Harvvard.
titleStmt.author: Harward, Simon, fl. 1572-1614.

publicationStmt.publisher: By F. Kingston for Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
